about.title: Us
about.parraf-1: At Seres Desarrollos, we are passionate about transforming innovative ideas into residential projects that enhance people's lives. Our inspiration comes from the constant pursuit of a more interesting and healthy lifestyle, whether in the city or surrounded by nature.
about.parraf-2: Each project we create is an opportunity to transform spaces into unique places where our clients and investors can find their ideal spot. We believe in the power of purposeful construction and the ability of well-designed environments to positively influence quality of life. We are driven by a commitment to well-being and a vision that combines modernity with a connection to the surroundings, because we know that every detail matters in making each development a special place to live.

cards.card-1: Innovative, high-quality developments focused on enhancing people's experiences.
cards.card-2: Land in prime locations with outstanding features and excellent appreciation.
cards.card-3: Creative projects with innovative architecture and great design.
cards.card-4: Amenities with a holistic vision that integrate physical and emotional well-being.
cards.car-5: Sustainable technologies and infrastructures reduce environmental impact and enhance quality of life.
cards.card-6: Buildings that positively connect with the natural environment.

cta.text: Real estate investment ventures and quality of life.

text-are.titulo: Discover Your Haven in the Heart of Bariloche
text-are.parraf-1: Located in Bariloche's exclusive Country Club, we are crafting 8 modern homes of 140 m², designed to deliver an exceptional lifestyle.
text-are.parraf-2: Each home, spread across two floors, features 3 bedrooms (one en-suite), a bathroom, a spacious double-height living-dining area, a kitchen with a breakfast bar, and a semi-covered deck with a grill. Additionally, each unit includes a covered garage and a storage space.
text-are.parraf-3: The houses are north-facing, with large windows that open to breathtaking landscapes. The deck connects to a private garden, extending toward the polo field, while the wooded slopes of Cerro Otto provide a stunning backdrop visible from every residence.
text-are.parraf-4: Here, you'll enjoy a life in harmony with nature, where exercise and social living blend seamlessly with serene spaces for contemplation, all within a thoughtfully designed environment. The privacy of your home is perfectly complemented by the comfort and entertainment offered by the most developed Country Club in Patagonia. A privileged haven to experience Patagonia, whether as a vacation retreat or your permanent home, without compromising on comfort. Welcome to your new lifestyle!

diseño-are.parraf-1: The architecture by Studio Erppen is inspired by a deep connection with the landscape, achieving a harmonious fusion with nature. Its organic design features a faceted roof that blends subtly with the surroundings, evoking the rocky formations of the mountain range.
diseño-are.parraf-2: The result is a contemporary proposal that reflects the aesthetics and architectural approach of Central Europe, creating a space that is not only visually striking but also respects and enhances the natural beauty that surrounds it.
diseño-are.parraf-3: A sustainable approach is fundamental to well-thought-out and responsible architecture. Our project integrates passive energy efficiency technologies and offers clients various complementary infrastructures, including photovoltaic panels and solar collectors, to promote self-sufficiency in electricity and hot water.
diseño-are.parraf-4: Landscaping with native species fosters integration with the surroundings, while the bio-environmental lagoon creates an ideal habitat for birds and aquatic plants. Additionally, a garden designed for growing vegetables and herbs provides a deeper connection to nature's cycles.

text-guemes.parraf-1: In Barrio Belgrano, we are developing a building with 30 apartments ranging from 40 to 80 square meters, some of which include an additional 11-square-meter loft. Its strategic location offers views of Lake Nahuel Huapi and is just 12 blocks from the city center, providing both convenience and accessibility.

diseño-guemes.parraf-1: Designed with a contemporary vision, Güemes Haus stands out as a high-performance product thanks to its innovative design and range of amenities. It is a unique offering with limited competition, as it is a building with only a few exclusive units.
diseño-guemes.parraf-2: The project aims to promote a lifestyle in an exceptional natural setting through modern, functional, and sustainable architecture that integrates with the landscape while contributing to the local architectural heritage.
diseño-guemes.parraf-3: The architectural design utilizes natural-looking, low-maintenance materials, ensuring a variety of textures and tones that enhance the overall aesthetic appeal.

text-san.parraf-d: An elegant and modern development in the heart of Bariloche, blending design, nature, and comfort. Just steps away from the city center, the forest, and Lake Nahuel Huapi.
text-san.unidades: 12 studio units of 36 m2. 9 studio units of 42 m2. 3 studio units of 52 m2. 3 studio units of 56 m2 with garden patio. 3 two-bedroom triplex units of 104 m² with terrace. 6 underground parking spaces. 1 commercial space of 40 m².

diseño-san.parraf-c:
Modern architecture with noble materials (stone, granite, wood).
Comfort-enhancing technology, including solar-powered lighting for common areas and smart home automation for security, with options to automate alarms, blinds, lighting, sound, TV, and heating.
Thermal efficiency, featuring central heating and air conditioning.
Thermal and acoustic insulation, with wood-like PVC carpentry and double-glazed windows.
Premium brand elevator and high-quality finishing details.
diseño-san.parraf-v:
Prime location in the center of Bariloche.
Easy access to dining, shopping, and recreational activities.
Stunning views of the lake and Mounts Otto and Runge.
High investment potential as a residence or for tourist rentals.

text-live.parraf-d: Seres Live O'Connor is a development focused on meeting the needs of security, comfort, and architectural design, while maintaining high construction quality and sustainability, with amenities for a harmonious and healthy life or stay.
text-live.ubicacion: Just meters from the waterfront and the source of the Ñireco Stream, and just a few blocks from the center of Bariloche.
text-live.unidades:
37 studio apartments of 38 m2.
12 two-bedroom apartments of 60 m2.
8 three-bedroom apartments with terrace, featuring 55 m2 of covered space and 20 m2 of uncovered space.
4 four-bedroom apartments with terrace, featuring 70 m2 of covered space and 70 m2 of uncovered space.
text-live.cochera: 22 underground parking spaces accessible via a vehicular ramp.

diseño-live.parraf-d:
Modern architecture and innovative design.
Leisure, fitness, and relaxation spaces: heated indoor pool, gym, and gardens.
Thermal efficiency, with high-recovery central heating and air conditioning for both cooling and heating.
Thermal and acoustic insulation, with wood-like PVC carpentry and double-glazed windows.
High-quality finishing details, including Patagonian porphyry stone cladding and reconstituted granite flooring.
Smart home automation for security, with the possibility to automate alarms, blinds, lighting, sound, TV, and heating.
diseño-live.parraf-v:
Privileged location surrounded by natural beauty and close to the city center.
Access to dining, shopping, and recreational activities.
Equipped with common areas featuring high-quality infrastructure for fitness and leisure.
Ideal for long-term or short-term rentals.
